DataElement.preferredName: All Required Items For Progressive Disease Rapid Central Review Submitted Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator of whether all items required for rapid central review for progressive disease was submitted.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: All Requirement Entity For Progressive Disease Rapidly Central Review Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._An independently existing thing (living or nonliving).:The reason of something._A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity._Acting or occurring in a brief period of time._Conducts reviews on behalf of all study sites that agree to participate in the centralized review process with imaging experts._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent._Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory._An independently existing thing (living or nonliving).

Concepts.definition: To a complete degree or to the full or entire extent.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.
An independently existing thing (living or nonliving).

Property.preferredName: For Progressive Disease Rapidly Central Review Submission
Property.preferredDefinition: The reason of something._A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity._Acting or occurring in a brief period of time._Conducts reviews on behalf of all study sites that agree to participate in the centralized review process with imaging experts._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

Concepts.definition: A clinical, pathologic, and/or molecular finding indicating that the course of a disease is worsening in terms of extent or severity.
Acting or occurring in a brief period of time.
Conducts reviews on behalf of all study sites that agree to participate in the centralized review process with imaging experts.
The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.
